thread.title: Jimmy Fallon falls holding Jägermeister bottle in Harvard Square, injures hand - Celebrity news
thread.title_full: Jimmy Fallon falls holding Jägermeister bottle in Harvard Square, injures hand - Celebrity news

author: boston.com
title: Jimmy Fallon falls holding Jägermeister bottle in Harvard Square, injures hand - Celebrity news
text:
Jimmy Fallon makes his way through the crowd in Harvard Square Saturday before being awarded the Elmer Award for Excellence in Humor by the Harvard Lampoon. Barry Chin / The Boston Globe The honor only has been bestowed seven times. Past recipients include Jay Leno and Robin Williams. Barry Chin / The Boston Globe Fallon received a check for 85 cents along with the award. Barry Chin / The Boston Globe Fallon was crowned “Emperor of Comedy.” Barry Chin / The Boston Globe Fallon was honored on the steps of Lampoon Castle. The Harvard Lampoon is the country’s oldest continuously published humor magazine. Barry Chin / The Boston Globe Advertisement Jimmy Fallon just can’t seem to stay on his feet.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A mere four months after the Tonight Show host almost lost a finger when he tripped on a rug , Fallon was at it again Saturday night in Harvard Square, falling over someone with a bottle of Jägermeister in his hand—his other hand—and injuring it, too, according to People .
The magazine reported the comedian got his right hand checked out at Massachusetts General Hospital on Saturday night. Fallon posted a photo of his injured hand on Instagram Sunday, saying it was “nothing that a few band aids couldn’t fix.”
Nothing that a few band aids couldn't fix.
A photo posted by Jimmy Fallon (@jimmyfallon) on Oct 25, 2015 at 11:24am PDT
Instagram user @cryan__ryan caught the fall on camera.
Jimmy Fallin folks! #jimmyfallon #latenightwithjimmyfallon #harvard @jonthesneider and @johndoomsdayhoward
A video posted by cryan ryan (@cryan__ryan) on Oct 24, 2015 at 6:52pm PDT
As well as Fallon’s triumphant recovery.
#jimmyfallon after the fall. He seemed ok to me, for all those concerned. Still the man! #latenightwithjimmyfallon #jimmyfallin @jonthesneider and @johndoomsdayhoward
A video posted by cryan ryan (@cryan__ryan) on Oct 24, 2015 at 7:47pm PDT
Earlier, Fallon paraded through Harvard Square , as he was in town to accept the Elmer Award for Excellence in Humor from the Harvard Lampoon , the country’s oldest continuously published humor magazine. (Oh, he also had scorpion bowls with Harvard students at Hong Kong, according to People .)
The magazine has only given out the honor seven times. Past recipients include Jay Leno and Robin Williams.
Thank you, @harvardlampoon.
A photo posted by Jimmy Fallon (@jimmyfallon) on Oct 25, 2015 at 6:04am PDT
Information from the Associated Press was used in this report.
